# [Interview #576, Entry #21](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=576#21)

#### [pmisir (8 November 2010)](http://twitter.com/pmisir/status/1716782750507008)

Re:
*A Memory of Light*
, I hope there'll be tons more Tuon/Seanchan?

#### [Brandon Sanderson (8 November 2010)](http://twitter.com/BrandonSandrson/status/1720087509737472)

There will be more than there was in
*Towers of Midnight*
.
